player_skill.name: Athletics
player_skill.description_key: Running faster and longer than the next guy is probably the best skill you can develop in an apocalypse. Improve you run and walk speed by doing your cardio.

player_skill.name: upperBodyAction
player_skill.description_key: 80 pound weaklings don't last long in an apocalypse. Swinging tools and punching stuff will help you break blocks faster and will pump you up!

action_skill.name: bluntWeaponsAction
action_skill.description_key: Blunt weapons like clubs and bats are great for bashing in zombie skulls. The more skill you have in blunt weapons, the more damage you will do to zombies and living things.

action_skill.name: bladeWeaponsAction
action_skill.description_key: Higher skill with blade weapons like knives, axes and swords make you more effective at shortening zombies to shoulder height. You will also do more damage to zombies and living things.

action_skill.name: archeryAction
action_skill.description_key: Keeping your distance from danger is a smart strategy in the apocalypse. The bow and crossbow are a good way stay safe while getting your zombie killing job done. The more skill you have in archery, the more damage and dismemberment chance you have, plus you reload faster and shoot with less arch.

action_skill.name: pistolsAction
action_skill.description_key: Pistols may not be the best guns available, but there sure are lots of them laying around. More skill gives you a better chance at dismemberment.

action_skill.name: shotgunsAction
action_skill.description_key: Shotguns were always the goto gun choice of the veteran apocalypse fan. Now its your chance to wield one. More skill gives you a better chance at dismemberment.

action_skill.name: submachineGunsAction
action_skill.description_key: Sunmachineguns throw a lot of lead at your problems, which is often the best solution. More skill gives you a better chance at dismemberment.

action_skill.name: assaultRiflesAction
action_skill.description_key: Assault rifles were used by soldies for one good reason, they are one of the finest personal killing machine ever invented. More skill gives you a better chance at dismemberment.

action_skill.name: snipersAction
action_skill.description_key: Sniper rifles are great for long distance headshots. More skill gives you a better chance at dismemberment.

action_skill.name: heavyGunsAction
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with Heavy Guns. Gain skill by using items from this group

action_skill.name: medicineCraft
action_skill.description_key: Medicine is your healing skill. The more skill you have, the more health you recover when you use healing supplies.

crafting_skill.name: cookingCraft
crafting_skill.description_key: Learn to cook more filling and nutritious food.

crafting_skill.name: huntingCraft
crafting_skill.description_key: Learn to craft better Hunting knifes and fishing lures.

crafting_skill.name: craftedGunsCraft
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft guns of better quality, make them faster, and repair them better with this skill.

crafting_skill.name: engineeringCraft
crafting_skill.description_key: Learn to be an engineer! Make lots of stuff better and faster! Woo Woo!

crafting_skill.name: chemistryCraft
crafting_skill.description_key: Better living through chemistry! Learn to make lots of chemical stuff.....

perk.name: gunPowderPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Gun Powder on the chemistry station using the Mortar And Pestle

perk.name: pipeBombPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Pipe Bombs on the wood working bench

perk.name: pressurePlateMinePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Pressure Plate Mine on the wood working bench using a wrench

perk.name: hubcapMinePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Hubcap Mine on the wood working bench using a wrench

perk.name: airFilterMinePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Air Filter Mine on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: nitroglycerinPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Nitroglycerin chemistry station woth a beaker. Explosives made with this will destroy hardstone

perk.name: dynamitePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Dynamite and TNT on the chemistry station. These explosives will destroy hardstone

perk.name: weaponRepairPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft weapon repair kits

perk.name: silencerPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to build a Silencer on the work bench

perk.name: pistolSilencerAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach Silencers to Pistols on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: huntingRifleScopeAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach sniper scopes to Huntingrifeles on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: huntingRifleSilencerAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach Silencers to Hunting Rifles on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: magnumScopeAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach sniper scopes to Magnums on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: ak47ScopeAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach sniper scopes to AK47s on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: ak47SilencerAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach Silencers to AK47s on the metal working bench using a wrench.

perk.name: bulletPressPerk
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft your very own bullet press on the work bench

perk.name: bulletCasingPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft brass into bullet Casing with the chemistry set

perk.name: hotLeadPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to smelt lead into bullet tips and buck shot in the forge

perk.name: slugPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Shotgun Slugs with a bullet press

perk.name: crossbowPerk
perk.description_key: Level 1 - Learn to build and disassemble a simple Crossbow, crafting its parts on the wood working bench using a wrench. Level 2 - Learn to add a scope to the crossbow. Level 3 - Learn to upgrade to a automatic 6 shot crossbow.

perk.name: woodenSpearPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to harden a basic Wood Spear in the campfire and throwable Javelin

perk.name: ironSpearPerk
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft an Iron Spear head in the forge and craft a spear and throwable Javelin with it

perk.name: ironArrowsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Arrow heads in the forge using an anvil and crossbow bolts

perk.name: steelArrowsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Arrows and crossbow bolts on the work bench

perk.name: ductTapePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft ductTape with the chemistry station

perk.name: flamingArrowsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Flaming Arrows at the wood work bench

perk.name: explodingCrossbowBoltsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft powerful Exploding Crossbow Bolts at the wood work bench

perk.name: ironClubPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to upgrade your wooden Club to a iron melee club. Crafted on the Anvil using the Claw Hammer.

perk.name: spikedClubPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to apply spikes to your bats on the Wood Working Bench with a Claw Hammer

perk.name: lucillePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to upgrade your Lucille

perk.name: steelSpikedClubPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to upgrade your spiked club using steel spikes on the metal working bench

perk.name: sledgeHammerPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to forge a sledge hammer head in the Forge with a mold and use it to craft a sledge hammer

perk.name: machetePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Machete on the anvil using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Large Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a long strong knife thats good for fighting.

perk.name: huntersKnifePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a hunting Knife on the anvil using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Small Knife Blade that you need to craft it in the forge using the anvil. This is a sharp knife that will harvest more and better animal parts. Harvesting animals with this knife will increase your hunting skill

perk.name: katanaPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a katana on the anvil using a claw hammer and learn how to craft the Large Knife Blade in the forge using the anvil that you need to craft it. This is a long strong knife thats good for fighting.

perk.name: barbedWirePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Barbed Wire in the forge using a anvil

perk.name: spikesPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Wooden Spikes

perk.name: logTipsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Log Tips

perk.name: barbedFencePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Barbed Fence

perk.name: methaneProducerPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Methane gas producer on the metal working bench and use it to craft methane gas bombs.

perk.name: ironSpikes
perk.description_key: Learn to craft iron Spikes that can be upgraded into steel spikes

perk.name: razorWire
perk.description_key: Learn to craft razor wire that can entangle trespasser

perk.name: simpleWorkBenchPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Wood Working Bench. Use it to craft more complex items and faster. The wood working bench has 3 tools - CircularSaw, claw Hammer and wrench.

perk.name: forgePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft and use a forge

perk.name: anvilPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft an anvil in a forge. The Anvil can be used as a workstation or as a tool in a workstation. Use a Hand Dolly to pick it back up and re install it.

perk.name: forgedIronPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a small stone Forge. Use it to smelt iron, brass, lead, glass, stone and clay. The Forge has 3 tools - anvil, calipers and tool And Die Set.

perk.name: shortMetalPipePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Short Metal Pipes like a man with your bare hands

perk.name: blastFurnacePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a large brick Blast Furnace. Use it to smelt steel, iron, coal and clay. Use this to forge steel.

perk.name: forgedSteelPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Forged Steel in the blast Furnace

perk.name: shortSteelPipePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Short Steel Pipe like a man with your bare hands

perk.name: steelToolsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to forge Steel tool heads in the Blast furnace and craft steel tools on the the metal working bench.

perk.name: spotlightPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a working spotlight on the work bench using the Compact Driver.

perk.name: cementMixerPerk
perk.description_key: Lean to craft a cement mixer on the wood working bench using a wrench. use it to make cement, concrete mix and other terrain blocks

perk.name: refineryPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a refinery on the wood working bench using a wrench. Use it to creat gas, oil and other chemicals

perk.name: oilPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to process oil in a refinery

perk.name: oilPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to process GAS in a refinery

perk.name: screwdriverPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to repair a screwdriver and craft it on the Metal Working Bench

perk.name: chainsawPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to build and maintain a Chainsaw

perk.name: augerPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to build and maintain an Auger that is cappable of digging soil and gravel quickly

perk.name: nailgunPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to build and maintain a nailgun

perk.name: stoneDrillPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to build and maintain a Stone drill that is cappable of digging hardstone and metals

perk.name: fieldKnife
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Field Knife on the Anvil using a Claw Hammer. Using the Field Knife to butcher animals will gather more and rarer resources

perk.name: ironToolsPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to forge Iron tool heads in the Forge with a Anvil and use them to craft Iron tools

perk.name: nailPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft basic Nail in the forge

perk.name: stillPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a still

perk.name: chemistryStationPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft achemistry Station on the wood working bench using a claw hammer. Use it to craft complex chemical and medical items. The Chemistry Station has 2 tools - Mortar And Pestle and beaker.

perk.name: animalHideArmorPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft basic animal hide clothing on the armor table using a Leather Needle.

perk.name: scrapIronArmorPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Scrap Iron Armor on the armor table using a claw hammer.

perk.name: ironArmorPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Armor on the armor table using a anvil.

perk.name: lightAttachmentPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to attach flashlights to helmets on the armor table

perk.name: molotovCocktailPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Molotov Cocktails on the wood working bench

perk.name: aloeCreamPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft healing creams

perk.name: firstAidBandagePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a First Aid Bandage

perk.name: bloodDrawKitPerk
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a Blood Draw Kit with the Chemistry set

perk.name: firstAidPerk
perk.description_key: Learn advanced a first aid kit

perk.name: smallBedPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Small Bed on the work bench using a wrench. When rested on it will heal and warm you

perk.name: cookingGearPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft cooking equipment in the forge

perk.name: gunOilPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Gun Oil to keep those weapons sweet

perk.name: chickenCoopPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft a chicken coop and use it to hatch and raise a chicken. Once fully grown it will produce feathers or eggs and can be slaughtered for meat.

perk.name: woodBuilding
perk.description_key: Wood Building is the skill to master if you want to build with wood. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make nails and planks at skill level 3.

perk.name: cobblestoneBuilding
perk.description_key: Cobblestone Building is the skill to master if you want to build with cobblestone. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make cobblestones at skill level 3

perk.name: brickBuilding
perk.description_key: Brick Building is the skill to master if you want to build with bricks. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make bricks at skill level 3

perk.name: concreteBuilding
perk.description_key: Concrete Building is the skill to master if you want to build with cement. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make cement at skill level 3

perk.name: rConcreteBuilding
perk.description_key: Reinforced Concrete Building is the skill to master if you want to build with concrete mix and rebar. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make concrete mix at skill level 3

perk.name: scrapIronBuilding
perk.description_key: Scrapiron Building is the skill to master if you want to build with scrapiron. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make scrapiron sheets plus nuts and bolts at skill level 3

perk.name: steelBuilding
perk.description_key: Steel Building is the skill to master if you want to build with forged steel. Learn these skill by completing your building quest chain and then you will Learn to make forged steel sheets at skill level 3

perk.description_key: Learn to craft a wooden ladder

perk.description_key: Learn to craft a secure storage container

perk.description_key: Learn to craft a secure Wooden Door

perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Doors on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Gun Safe on the metal working bench using a wrench

perk.name: ironTrussingPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron Trussing in the forge using a anvil

perk.name: steelVaultHatchPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft steel Vault Hatches on the metal working bench using the wielder

perk.name: steelVaultDoorPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Steel Vault Doors on the metal working bench using the Wielder

perk.name: steelGunSafePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft The Steel Gun Safe on the work bench using the Wielder. these are the strongest secure storage container you can make

perk.name: asphaltPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to make asphalt in a mixer. use it to make traveling easier

perk.name: tallowPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Tallow on the Campfire in a Pot

perk.name: candlesPerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Candles

perk.name: gluePerk
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Glue with the chemistry station

perk.description_key: Learn to craft a Garage Door on the work bench

perk.description_key: An Electric Stick. Shocking!
